translations: 夷为平地；破坏；消除；拆毁

sentences.sentence: It is time to raze it.
Raze what was left of the city from the surface of the earth.
sentences.translation: 使这个城市剩下的东西从地球表面上消失。

sentences.sentence: The owners intend to raze the hotel and erect an office building on the site.
sentences.translation: 业主打算夷平酒店和竖立一座办公大楼在网站上。
